channel.title: Making a server for the moparscape client
channel.description: Hi there, I decided to use my common sence and figure out that with what moparisthebest is doing with the serverstatus page (making moparscape compatible servers have the higher authority) is the best thing I could do, so right now I'm dumping my current server and going rewrite all of the content etc so it works like a charm with moparscape. Anyways because I'm sort of doing it for this community any suggestions to what I should add? Thanks.

item.title: Making a server for the moparscape client
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

You should allow the login protocol be edited for every client

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server for the moparscape client

Actually, that seems a lot more conveniant! Thanks mopar

item.title: Making a server for the moparscape client
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You could also use your current server and just make your client work inside of moparscape.

I’ll be coming out with a new version of moparscape and detailed instructions on how to write a client for it shortly.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server for the moparscape client
